short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-scroll to the bottom of any extended webpage. Ideal for reading lengthy articles, news, manga, and other materials.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is a browser extension that enables automatic scrolling to the bottom of a long webpage. It provides settings for controlling the scrolling behavior, such as the number of pixels to scroll per scroll and the duration of each scroll in seconds. Additionally, Scrolly allows you to start and stop the scrolling process using keyboard shortcuts and provides an option to scroll back to the top of the page.


Usage:
- Click the extension and set the Scroll Pixel and Seconds per Scroll.
- To start scrolling, just simply click the Start button and to stop, just simply click the button again.
- To scroll to the top of the page, just simply click the Scroll to Top button.
- Note before keyboard shorts: open first the extension in your browser during first installation to initialize default settings.

Keyboard Shortcut:
- Start and Stop Scroll (Ctrl+Shfit+Space)
- Scroll to Top (Ctrl+Shfit+ArrowUp)
